qas.question: In which direction is 181st Street largely residential?
In which direction is 181st Street mostly commercial?
Which street marks the western boundary of the shopping distrit?
Which river touches the major shopping district near 181st Street?

context: <a0_0>West<a0_0/> of Fort Washington Avenue, 181st Street is largely residential, bordering Hudson Heights and having a few shops to serve the local residents. <a1_0>East<a1_0/> of <a2_0>Fort Washington Avenue<a2_0/>, the street becomes increasingly commercial, becoming dominated entirely by retail stores where the street reaches Broadway and continues as such until reaching the <a3_0>Harlem<a3_0/> River. It is the area's major shopping district.
